Correct: Touch your nose with your finger.
Stomp your feet on the ground.
Point to the sky with your arm.
Touch your chin with your hand.
Point to your head with your finger.

Wrong: The bird is driving a car.

Correct: Touch the sole of your foot with your hand.
Touch your shoulders with your hands.
Tap your knees with your hands.
Hold your ankle with your hand.
Support your chin with your hand.

Wrong: The sun is driving a car.

Correct: Grab your arm with your hand.
Kick the ball with your foot.
Scratch your back with your hand.
Touch your wrist with your hand.
Tap the floor with your foot.
Touch your cheek with your hand.
Cover your head with your hands.
Grab your knee with your hand.
Hold your ankle with your hand.
